name: Eau de Lubin
details: main types are warm, woody, oriental and fresh, with each effect brought out by different combinations of fragrances.

name: Jean Marie Farina
details: Fresh scents, like Davidoff Cool Water, generally rely on aquatic and citrus notes, whereas warm scents.

name: Pot Pourri
details: Fresh fragrances usually comprise of citrus, water and green notes.

name: Au Fil de l'Eau
details: Citrus-based fragrances are usually created with lemon, mandarin and bergamot, while water fragrances are made with aquatic notes

name: L'Origan
details: Floral fragrances are one of the most popular families, and one of the broadest.

name: Narcisse Noir
details: Sweet and flowery scent will belong under this family, using notes such as roses, jasmine, lilies and peonies.

name: Violette Précieuse
details: Oriental fragrances are warm, sweet and even a little spicy.

name: Émeraude
details: A more luxurious fragrance family, oriental fragrances vary from floral oriental, soft oriental and woody oriental.

name: Émeraude
details: A more luxurious fragrance family, oriental fragrances vary from floral oriental, soft oriental and woody oriental.

name: Bellodgia
details: Perfumes and aftershaves in this family are rich and sensual, often made with interesting notes of cardamom, cinnamon.

name: Dunhill for Men
details: Woody fragrances are another warm family, with a mysterious and captivating scent .

name: Nuit de Longchamp
details: You will often see top, middle and base notes being used to describe a fragrance.
